sub_title: Assistant Product Planning at the Research & Development Department | Market Research | Digital Marketing Specialist
summary:
Product Owner | Event Planner | Market Researcher | Digital Marketing

Professional multilingual (Dutch, English, Italian and Spanish) with 8 years of experience as product owner, a strong B2B- B2C experience and more than 6 years in planning. Specialized in market research, product marketing, digital marketing, event planning and publishing. 

Outstanding communication skills, leader and team player, passionate in challenges, always acting to achieve the best result. Analytic and focused, very organized, dynamic, original and innovative problem solver thanks to a multifaceted experience in different environments, functions and countries. Looking for a stimulating work environment.

profile_positions.title: Assistant Product Planning at the R&D Department

profile_positions.description:
I developed my interest for photography in several directions: exhibitions and photo contests, illustrations for books and both paper and web magazines, photoshoots and advertising. Over the years I have attended in-depth courses and participated in numerous photographic competitions, also winning some awards and having the opportunity to exhibit my works in different environments on the occasion of local cultural events, promoting mainly messages of fairness, respect and union. 

For this role I deepened into different aspects of the following skills: 
Wedding Photography | Event Photography | Portrait Photography | Product & Still Life Photography | Advertising photography | Lightroom | Photoshop | Adobe Illustrator | Indesign | business development | social media marketing | communication.

For the exhibitions area I deepened most: Creativity | Lifestyle photography | Artistic photography | Travel Photography | Street Photography | event planning | public speaking | human rights.  

To have an idea of my works, please visit my website www.fotovik.com
profile_positions.title: Freelance Photographer
Product Owner | Scrum Master | Digital Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description: Working to ease the team daily activities as holiday replacement of the permanent receptionist.
profile_positions.title: Receptionist |  Administrator
IT Project Consultant | UX Tester  PVH Europe B.V. (Tommy Hilfiger)

profile_positions.description:
Giunti Scuola / Giunti Progetti Educativi, Florence, Italy ( www.giuntiscuola.it ) - Production and 
commercialization of editorial educational materials for school, public institutions and private companies.
In different roles, I have been carrying out a huge number of duties with an increasing level 
of responsibility and autonomy.

• As Personal Assistant and Second Secretary of the CEOs, my most important duties were:
– managing and planning the agenda from A to Z, planning business travel, keeping contacts with other 
publishers, colleagues and authors; solving all kind of problems;
– keeping confidentiality and working with tact, attention for details and providing high level of service;
– reviewing the news about our production and firm, providing any kind of needed reports.

• As Team Secretary & Accountant Manager, besides a number of other duties, I was responsible for:
– supporting a team of 45 persons solving any kind of problems and helping them with my knowledge;
– keeping relations with suppliers, contractors, warehouses and customers who subscribed 
to our magazines;
– managing from A to Z the office administration, the layout of contracts, payments, invoices (SAP), 
and the inventory;
– maintaining updated documentation of legal regulations (ISO certification and copyright procedures).

• As Event Planner I was responsible for:
– the organization of local and national conferences and congresses, mostly concerning cultural 
or educational teachers training. The events lasting 1-2 days, involving more than 1500 guests, were 
organized about 4 times a year in different Italian cities;
– the presentations of new books introduced by the author hosted in the Giunti bookstore or online events;
– the commercial meetings (of about 150 guests), and corporate team building activities. 
For each event, I had to constantly keep the budget under control, to define all the logistic, technical, 
promotional and accounting details.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant of the editorial Director | Team secretary | Event Planner

profile_positions.description:
Giunti Progetti Educativi: Production and distribution of educational editorial products for teachers and children, made in collaboration both with public administrations, organizations and private companies.

I worked with various tasks both of secretariat and promotion at a national level of the editorial products. Besides, within the national contest for schools “Che gusto c’è” (“What’s the taste”) I archived all incoming material, managed the call center, helped the teacher to better understand how to manage it, and, as a juror of the project, I contributed to sort out the winner production.

http://www.giuntiprogettieducativi.it/
profile_positions.title: Commercial secretarial consultant | Call center Manager

profile_positions.description:
As cook: I prepared simple dishes (pasta, salads, sandwiches, snacks) for
the appetizers.
As bartender: I had to manage the bar counter, to prepare cocktails and
appetizers. I had also to serve at the tables and collect payment.

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Jes-Pub/199225666813841?sk=info
profile_positions.title: Bartender, cook, waitress and cashier
Real Estate Agent

profile_positions.description:
Lunch cafe, wine bar specialized also in chocolate (Eraclea catalogues) and tea (more then 100 types), kitchen open for lunch.

My duties in the kitchen were mainly to prepare cakes, mousses and biscuits that would be served with tea and chocolate. I was also responsible for the preparation of quick meals, such as salads, sandwiches and pasta dishes.
With different schedules, I had the role of bartender and my job was to prepare tea, chocolate, Espresso coffee, cappuccino and cocktails, as well as to serve them at the tables. During the wine tasting evenings, I had also to explain to the customers the differences between the served wines.
profile_positions.title: Bartender and cook

Scioglilibro sector: Production of educational activities and animation projects to be carried out in schools or libraries, in partnership with private sponsors

In a completely independent way, for 6 months, I reorganized the administrative records of this non-profit organisation for the period 2007 - 2009 and I managed the account administration for the year 2010. Besides, I also trained the person that replaced me in 2011.
http://www.scioglilibro.it/
